articles.content: While exploring Fontaine in Genshin Impact, you may run into Strange Parts, which are screws rewarded from specific quests. These screws have two uses: You need four for the Ancient Colors world ques… [+1184 chars]

articles.title: Immortals of Aveum to Support DLSS 3, FSR 2.2; 60+FPS Recommended PC Specs Shared by Devs - Wccftech
articles.description: Ascendant Studios confirmed that Immortals of Aveum supports NVIDIA DLSS 3 and AMD FSR 2.2. They also shared the updated recommended PC specs
articles.content:
Today, Ascendant Studios shared new technical information on its debut game Immortals of Aveum ahead of next week's launch.
